channel.title: What is the best hosting site? (website)
channel.description:
OK so i want to host a .net or .org domain, but i don't know which hosting company to try.
it must have MySQL database, and remote.
please comment quickly!

item.title: What is the best hosting site? (website)
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

http://omni-webhosting.com/

I recommend it… I’ve been using it since June 20th with absolutely no problems.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the best hosting site? (website)

item.title: What is the best hosting site? (website)
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

Be cautious about cheap hosts that offer “unlimited” packages, expecially if you’re getting them at extremely cheap prices. I’ve had an experience with such a host and it was basically a waste of money.

Generally, you should do your own research and find what plans from companies best suit you and your budget.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the best hosting site? (website)

item.title: What is the best hosting site? (website)
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

x10hosting, simply because:

Ruby:

it’s cheap, unlimited and never down.

The FTP up/download speeds aren’t the best though.

Just for future reference, all general based questions belong here.

item.description:
